channel.title: CVE Feed for brandonwamboldt -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for brandonwamboldt -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0975|2024-08-01T18:26:30.346Z -- brandonwamboldt -- wordpress%20access%20control
item.description: The WordPress Access Control plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.13 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's "Make Website Members Only" feature (when unset) and view restricted page and post content.
